description: Try our easy to follow Quinoa Salad with Snapper recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quinoa Salad with Snapper Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place a serve of quinoa salad onto plates and top with snapper. Tip 1: Leftover quinoa salad is great the next day for lunch with a small can or tuna or red salmon. Tip 2: You can swap snapper for other firm white fish fillets.
